O

onCreate() - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called by the system when the service is first created.
onCreateCandidatesView() - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Create and return the view hierarchy used to show candidates.
onCreateInputView() - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Create and return the view hierarchy used for the input area (such as a soft keyboard).
onDisplayCompletions(CompletionInfo[]) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called when the application has reported auto-completion candidates that it would like to have the input method displayed.
onFinishInput() - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called to inform the input method that text input has finished in the last editor.
onInitializeInterface() - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
This is a hook that subclasses can use to perform initialization of their interface.
onKey(int, int[]) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Sends a key press to the listener.
onPress(int) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called when the user presses a key.
onRelease(int) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called when the user releases a key.
onStartInput(EditorInfo, boolean) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called to inform the input method that text input has started in an editor.
onStartInputView(EditorInfo, boolean) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called when the input view is being shown and input has started on a new editor.
onText(CharSequence) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
onUpdateSelection(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class de.hs_bremen.vkb.VirtualKeyBoard
Called when the application has reported a new selection region of the text.
